name: Non-Stop-Bus
description:
Drive a bus around town and try not no get fired. Starts relaxing and ramps up to arcade frenzy. Made for Extra Credits Jam  #3, theme "cycles".

 Controls:

  • Arrows/WASD - Move
  • Space - Honk

Team:

  • Iván Batalla: Art
  • Hernán Marandino: Sound & Music
  • Edu Gargollo: Programming

Help/Troubleshooting

We found the second level too hard after other people testing the game. This is not what we intended, so if you get stuck press P on the keyboard to skip that level. This can cause the game to become a bit buggy but should allow you to experience the whole game.

UPDATE: You can try the updated, post-jam version here:  https://edugargollo.itch.io/nonstopbus?password=postjam  (fewer bugs, fixed illumination and better balanced)
